https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/whn30vLHgM5IyMorCVGAsXzB3Zp.jpg Sophie Deraspe’s adaptation of the classic Greek tragedy of the same name reimagines the story of a woman’s quest for justice as a commentary on the immigrant experience in contemporary Montreal. Antigone
